page.title: 15Holidays (7 year olds)
page.content: {In the middle of summer I am going to {Blackpool with my mummy and dad for {one week. I am going to Whitby for my holiday. We go every year. I am going in the car. {Last week we went to the Flower of May {holiday camp.We go away every year. I am going to Primrose Valley, and staying in a chalet. We go every year. {I am going to Devon in August for two {weeks. I am going on a train. } One Sunday I went to Egypt and the Yemen for a month. {I'm going to Criccieth in Wales for {one week. We're going to a cottage one {mile from the sea. I go to Cayton Bay for my summer holiday, and we stay in a caravan.
